stories.text:
Hi Everyone.

I am co-founder of DishAfrik and I am currently running the first Indiegogo campaign to be offering NFTs as perks.

Check it out here https://igg.me/at/dishafrik

One of the cool thing about the campaign is the use of NFTs.

Two of the rewards would be the chance to own one of the 54 NFTs which would be minted. The 54 NFTs will be a collage of 54 dishes from 54 African countries.

54 because there are currently 54 countries in Africa. (Yup you guessed right, the campaign is about something related to Africa)

Please check out the campaign here https://igg.me/at/dishafrik

Back the project and get one of the 54 NFTs that will be minted.

Also feel free to leave a comment if you have any question.
stories.title: First Indiegogo campaign to use NFTs as perks
